content:
Is there something strange happening with the RUST_BACKTRACE env var?
If I run RUST_BACKTRACE=full rust-analyzer analysis-stats . and it crashes, the backtrace still says
note: Some details are omitted, run with RUST_BACKTRACE=full for a verbose backtrace. for some reason.
The binaries from GitHub are stripped, so backtraces won't work very well
If you build your own, you might also want to bump the debug info level in Cargo.toml to get better ones.
